title: Cloud NaÃ¯ve: Europe and the 'Bijenkorf' Megascaler
summary:
Lately there’s been some confusion: places like SIDN (Dutch national operator of all internet names that end on .NL) claim that nobody in Europe can deliver their computer needs, and that they therefore must outsource their operations to American cloud providers.
Dutch version of this page here: Cloud Native, Europa, de ‘Bijenkorf’ Megascaler ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡±
Meanwhile, we have large providers of servers and services in the Netherlands and in Europe who claim that they can (and do) provide these kinds of services just fine.
